column1: Yeah about 10 years ago I had a horrifying experience. It was 100% their fault but they hit the water barrels and survived. They had no injuries but they almost ran me off the road.	What happened?

No I wasn't hit. It turned out they were drunk. I felt guilty but realized it was his fault.	That's really a scary experience! Did they have any cameras? How much money did you end up with for your accident repairs/

I don't know I was new to driving and hadn't experienced anything like that. I felt like my horn made him swerve into the water barrels.	Well, can you tell me about your experience? I think we swapped places	Sure, I went to a public toilet on vacation, but the thing that bugs me the most is the toilet paper not fitting inside the dumpster.
Oh my goodness, that's very scary! I hope you are okay now and the drunk driver was punished for his actions?	I was shaken up but otherwise fine. Yes, the guy I was riding was very drunk.
I there, dont know what to do, jst broke up with my girlfirned, we were 8 years together	I'm so sorry to hear this, are you okay?
Yes we decided together with our minds, and know i come home and feel so distant from the world	That's unfortunate, but maybe there is a light at the end of tunnel somewhere for you.
I couldn't wait to go to the concert.	What concert?
The U2 concert. Tickets were really expensive and I never thought we would be able to go, but somehow we did!!!	That's awesome! Were tickets for the whole band or just the two singers?
I'm so sad because i've read an article about a newborn girl who died because her parents didn't believe in medication and doctors	that sucks, how was she dying? was she sleep

she was born premature at home, she had hard time breathing on her own but instead of taking her to the doctor parents were just praying	that's terrible, i hate to hear that. i'm really sorry that this happened to your baby

yes! And i do believe in God and prayers but goodness gracious please take your children to the hospital and let God heal them THROUGH doctors	so my friend's baby fell down and scraped his knee yesterday and i was trying so hard to cheer him up	Oh no! Is he alright though?
i was singing nursery songs :)	I hope it wasn't serious!
If you happy and you know it :)	my husband lost a job but i'm hoping he can find a full time job soon	That really stinks. I am sorry to hear that. Is it a really big job?
thank you so much!	What kind of work do you both do
he is an armed guard	i just moved to this neighborhood and some dumb criminals shot one of my neighbors and ran into the woods!	Oh no, that sounds terrifying.
I do! I want to be able to protect my son	Oh no! Did they get into trouble?
i'm so excited because i'm finally going to visit my parents next month! I didn't see them for 3 years	That's cool. Are you flying or driving?
I moved to the US and they stayed in my homecountry	That's awesome, I bet your are going to miss them!

I was very angry when a co worker lied about a car accident to get out of working July 4th. I covered his shift till midnight and he was lying about the accident	What a jerk. Why July 4th? Did he do something wrong on that day, or did the 4th just spring to mind?
Yeah he got caught in someones pics on Facebook. Never lie and then go out with people who like to take pictures.	that sounds horrible! I would have cried!

Good idea. i don't like social media that much. It can get you in to trouble fast, even when expressing your opinions.	So yeah i drove 2 hours to get to wallmart. with 299 in my wallet as advertised, and the real price of the tv was 399 usd. what a bummer	What a rip off. What are going to do with all the money?
Yeah i had my hopes reall high and then i left empty handed, such a terrible feeling!	Yeah i would have been bummed out too. Did you walk into any electronics stores?

Yes, i guess walmart and the rest of false advertisement in the US, the look in my daugther eyes when i came home empty handed	My friend's boyfriend recently made a pass at me. I'm married, and I also am really good friend's with his girlfriend so I felt really bad. I made sure he knew I was loyal and honest to both!	That is good of you to show him you are loyal to him.  Does he know you did it for the good reasons?

I struggled with it, but my friend was in a really bad spot, with no income and raising her grandchild, he was the financial supporter. So, I didn't tell her, as I knew it would really hurt her in several ways, plus she really loves him!	She may have done it to protect herself.
my baby is sleeping. it's so peaceful and quiet in this house	Aww I'm sorry to hear that!
i totally agree with you!	Awww! Babies need company and a break from all of this crazy baby noise. It's like they don't know how to sleep.
hi, i feel so lonely sometimes because all my friends live in a different country	Why do you say that? Are you not happy there also?
i was thinking about it! I wanted to join a group for local moms	Have you thought about doing it locally?

I have a friend that has a child that is unruly and does bad things. One day at our home, he grabbed a game and sat on it, instantly breaking it! It was expensive and this really irked me, especially because she doesn't discipline him when he does bad things.	That's a jerk move on his part. I'm glad someone can put a damper on his behavior.

Me either! I have two of my own children, and I would have never let them get away with that kind of behavior when they were his age. I just don't understand those kind of parents@!	That is really not cool.  Did he get in trouble with anyone?
I'm so scared of bugs! i found one in my hair yesterday and almost died	Yeah I hate bugs too!

Ugh I hate bugs with a passion, they are so creepy	I recently spoke with my ex-girlfriend on the phone. The conversation went pretty well, and it reminded me of my past experiences with her.	That's good. It's good to have people you know from your past relationships.  Do you see them again?
Yes, they ended somewhat well, but there were tense moments. I am glad she's doing well, but I miss her.	I'm sorry that happened. But everyone makes mistakes.
Thank you! That means a lot.	One of the times I remember feeling the most blissed out in life was right after the birth of my first child.	Cherish that moment forever!

Obviously there are the demands of a new child -- but that feeling of finally meeting someone you waited so long for, and the love surrounding the whole situation. Truly something to remember.	Love and complications overcome time I guess, for those born with a good mom and dad.

Have you ever been in a situation when payment of some kind has come through *just* in the nick of time?! Talk about gratitude!	Of course! Life's not fair! You get screwed if someone steps in too debt and it seems like they always come out of no where and the bill comes in just a few days!

Absolutely. You go from scared and desperate to grateful and optimistic in one quick moment! It's not a situation I wish to be in again.	I've certainly felt that. I'm glad you felt that way and I know it's definitely an overwhelming situation!
Im so grateful for my family due to an incident with my friend	What happened that happened?

My friend lost her parents and siblings in a fire and their family was very close to mine. So seeing her go through the grief made me realize how thankful I should be	That's so sad. How did they lose them in fire?

Yes definitely. Never take anything for granted as you never know when it will be taken away from you	I'm a big believer in listening to your gut. Sometimes I might wonder where my intuition is leading me, but it always seems to be spot on.	That's so wise! It's so easy to miss intuition when you're trying so hard.
It is a "knowing" -- and a flowing! When something is right, it just feels easier to go with it -- like you're being led, even if you might not fully know to where.	That's great advice!

I couldnt celebrate my 18th birthday as I had exams during the time and I felt terrible for it. But my friends threw a surprise party for me and it was the best!	That's awesome! You have to appreciate your friends even if they don't like you at the time!

I was studying in my bedroom for a couple of hours straight with headphones on and then my mom called me to the living room for dinner and when I went out the whole place was decorated and everyone was there	That's so sweet! I love that feeling when your loved ones are being kind and thoughtful!

I feel lonely sometimes cause I live in a house with 5 girls and all of them have boyfriends and sometimes they are all hanging out with their significant others and I feel lonely	I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have any friends in your area to turn to?

Sometimes they joke about it and obviously I make it look like its totally fine cause I dont want to give them the impression that I am lonely but it does hurt sometimes	I am sorry you feel lonely!  Maybe if you just keep putting yourself out there it'll start to make more girls interested maybe?  You could also meet new friends?

As silly as it sounds, I was so surprised at how different my two kids were as babies. You're reminded that they're wired with their own personalities from the git-go.	That is a good point! They could very well be showing signs of early development!

One was pacifier, one was fingers. One wanted to co-sleep, one liked her space. One liked facing *out* in the Baby Bjorn carrier, one liked cocooning in a sling!	Hahaha, that's so cute! It is so easy to miss little moments like that when you're just learning. It's like you see it all and now it makes you want to learn and become better
The other day I had a deep craving for Chik-Fil-A.	Oh my gosh! I've never had that! Was it any good?
Mine too. So I drive there and pull in the parking lot and it's completely empty. I then realized it was Sunday.	That is crazy. I think they should do something about it.

I visited an orphan once and it was such a surreal moment. It made me realise how thankful I should be for a family	Oh, that sounds so sweet, I love seeing animals suffer and have their lives cut tragically short! How long did you go with them for?
Yes it definitely was. I went with intentions to teach the kid a few things but I ended up learning lots more from him	That is so amazing and I wish I could see an orphanage teach kids.

My oldest and my husband have always had a rough relationship. I've got to believe that as she gets older, it will get better!	That's good to hear. I'm not married and still get upset about my partner not being happy with me haha.

That's always good to hear. But in the moment -- argh, my *heart*. How did your mom maneuver the differences between y'all? Did that wear on her?	I have no idea. I don't get it. Does she live with yall, or does she live on her own? I'm not sure what would drive her to want to distance themselves from each other so soon-

But in the meantime -- the unspoken strain is NOT fun. But I'm glad to hear about a happy ending -- thank you for that!	I can still look back with shame at the way I treated a girl in sixth grade. I wasn't as bad as others, but that doesn't make me feel any better.	What did you do

Well, like a lot of 6th graders I was aware of *not* wanting to be an outcast for any reason. And unfortunately, she was. As an adult of course, my heart squeezes for *all* the kids we were!	What did she do? Did she say anything to you?

Unfortunately, she died. I only found out when Facebook first came out, and her brother and I "friended" one another.	Oh my, sorry for the heart squeeze! I can't believe she is gone. I am truly sorry.
I'm currently working for someone that is *such* a great example of a leader! It makes going into work inspiring every day / every way.	Wow. What makes you so empathetic to them?

That's a very kind statement, and certainly what I would strive for. And it's the rarity that *inspires* me. That should be the norm, not the exception! THAT'S what I'd like to inspire in people. How about you?	You are so right. I am a great coworker but I really dont do a lot to show it.

That is soul-sapping. What do you do to inspire yourself, and not let that kind of behavior drag you down?	I try not to let it bother me, but I certainly have had some experiences of mine that I would not want to repeat. It is a very difficult habit to break!
My friend's baby has grown so much since the last time I had seen her!	oh wow!! tell her that i said congrats
It had been about 8 weeks - I don't get out her way often, even though we live 30 minutes away.	Wow that's crazy!  How far away do you live?  Does she live on a farm or something?

Yes!  I got to be 'auntie' for a bit and help change her and get her fed and down for a nap while my friend had a chance to toss laundry in the wash.  It was a good day for everyone!	Running my first (and maybe only!) marathon felt like *such* a huge accomplishment!	Oh wow! I can only run 1 marathon, but I bet you were exhausted after that lol
Ah, it was the best! Plus it helped that I purposely chose an amazing destination in which to run it -- it was the Venice Marathon!	Wow! That is incredible. How far did it get?

We were living overseas at the times -- the most impressive part was crossing the Grand Canal over a pontoon of boats to finish the marathon ;-)	Congratulations! That sounds like an amazing experience! I've never been to a marathon.
I recently found out that a person I very much intimately admired did not feel the same way for me. I was pretty surprised.	That would surprise anyone! What made you unsure about this person?
She just started treating me differently all of a sudden. And now she is going to be moving away soon.	I hate to hear that! I hope you feel better.
I'm always appalled when I see bullying in action -- whether it's on a playground or political stage -- not much makes me angrier.	That's absolutely understandable.

How do you channel the anger? Obviously, it too easily turns into the same kind of negative emotion I'm upset about -- so that can feel hypocritical!	Have you talked to a psy, satanist or other person about it?

Are you ever tempted to put anyone's face on the punching bag?! Ha! (Kidding/not kidding!)	One morning my mother came to my house to pick my daughter up for school and told me she saw my daughter's cat on the road and he had been hit. I had to tell my daughter about the loss of her beloved pet.	Oh wow!  I bet you're really sorry and sad about this!  What did she say?

She was around 11, so she took it very hard. I went ahead and let her stay home from school, as I knew she wouldn't do well that day.	I'm glad she was able to comfort you. It must be so hard seeing your pet hurt like that.
I was soooo excited to take our kids to Disneyland for the first time!	I would be too! I've only been once but it was on a short trip!

Same! I was excited because I grew up going there. My grandparents lived in Tucson, and we would spend the summers with them -- the most exciting part being our drive to Disneyland each year!	That is awesome!  So lucky to have grandparents who lived close.  Disneyland is truly an amazing place!

California! Old school ;-) They've kept so much of the original, while adding lots of new attractions.	I recently spoke to my father for the first time in years. It reminded me of my childhood and the distant past.	That's good that you got to talk to him again! Did it make you happy or sad?
We spoke about our recent lives. Apparently he is in the market for a new car.	Wow, so he's looking for a job now. Good for him. What was the occasion? Do you know why he's looking for a job?

Do you like to organize your house.  My mother-in-law recently surprised me recently with some organizing stuff b/c she knows how much I love it!	Organize is nice! What sort of stuff do you like to pack?

Labels and Bins can be your best friend!  Especially with a new baby.	That's so fun! It sounds like you are excited to get the hang of it, and it sounds like you have a good idea how it will work out!
I find it odd -- and annoying -- when people don't respond to or even acknowledge emails.	I know right

It would be great if there was a way we could all tell the best way to reach someone -- I know some people prefer texts to emails -- but if you're in a work situation, how do you ensure communication?	Exactly what I was thinking. If only people would just text or call instead of talking on the phone...
I recently had a big argument with my sister. We both got very upset and angry at each other.	That is not healthy
I'm not so sure. We just had a discussion that heated and became an argument with tempers flying.	I'm glad it worked out for you guys

I felt most lonely when we first moved overseas, my husband then had to travel out of *that* country for business -- AND I had a new baby!	awww! that's so sweet!!! It's always amazing when we feel like we don't have anyone to come home too. I'm glad you were able to make friends and be together.

From Santa Fe to Hong Kong -- ultimately a fantastic adventure. And I ended up with a wonderful group of friends. Expats bond quickly!	That sounds like a great adventure! How did you find your people?
One of the saddest things to me is when people underestimate what they can do and/or are capable of.	Do you have an example to give me?  I'm always open to hearing that!

That's perfectly natural. You sound like the kind of person, though, that quickly regained their bearings. Disappointments like that usually come with some *good* lessons.	Thank you. Yeah, I'm glad people realize it takes practice to really improve.

Once my husband asked me not to tell my mom that he was busy that day when she needed his help but I told her anyway.  I really felt bad b/c he got pretty upset with me.	That was very thoughtful of you, I'm sure he was just trying his best

Yeah thats a good question.  I totally deserved him being mad.  I just felt bad for him b/c he was so busy that day and I didn't want him to have one more thing on his plate I guess	That is true and he must have gotten upset with you. But mom's love knows no bounds! He can always find something on his plate!

There was a back neighbor that called my 10 year old son a ugly name one time, simply because he entered her yard slightly when he rode around the corner.!	That's mean!  Were you able to confront them and ask them why they did it?
Yes, she lived several house back and she didn't know me, until after she did that! She knew me then, but after I talked to her, she apologized to both of us.	That is nice.
Too often, it's a health scare that makes us value health. It inspires me to try and do something to keep healthy every day.	I understand what you mean

Happily, I don't have one! It's more seeing family and friends and the situations they're in. Not everything can be helped -- but there are some things we can all do to take care of ourselves, you know?	I completely agree with that.

Every time I look through older photos of my children, I'm taken right back to the time they were that size, and what we were doing! It's a bittersweet feeling, for sure.	awh i know what you mean i wish they were the size of my palm
Are your kids adults now?	No, they're in their twenties, but I still miss them. They used to always go trick or treating at their neighborhood club on weekends, too.

I have an 18 year old as well -- I don't know about you, but it's hard to consider her an adult sometimes!	I have a hard time having confidence in myself but when I got married and I had my hair and makeup done I felt like I was beautiful!  I had so much confidence in myself that day and it was great!	That's wonderful! It feels so good when you feel like you have what you got!
I really try but it's hard to replicate that day for sure.	i bet that was a nice day for you

My husband and I both work for ourselves -- a blessing and a curse at times, since it can be tough to determine a "regular" income.	I can understand that.  It is challenging to make a living and having it decidedly provide for the needs of the family at times, but it is so do worth it.

We found a pretty good balance in that I have a part-time job that I *love* -- and that comes with benefits like insurance. That's a big worry addressed, right there.	Part time jobs can also be stressful
I am sorry, because I absolutely know that concern. I truly hope you find a resolution to that.	I met up with an old flame recently, didn't go how I expected	Really! How did that make you feel!
Well, right after she gave me a big hug, she introduced me to her new boyfriend.	That's awesome that she's into you! Did you like him at first?

I know right! No warning or anything. He turned out to be a nice guy, but I thought it was a little misleading on her part.	My family and I are going on vacation in a few weeks. We rented a largo beachfront condo and I can't wait!	That sounds really fun! I have never been on a vacation before, and I am really excited for you!
We are going to be staying at Miramar Beach in Florida, about an  hour Panama City Beach. The view is amazing from our balcony and we are so ready!	Sounds amazing! I hope you guys have fun!
I was supposed to go for brunch with my friend Maria the other day. At least that was the plan.	Oh nice!  How did it go?

Well, we had initially agreed to meet at 11. Wouldn't you know it, she didn't end up returning my text until 3PM!	Wow, that is really frustrating and frustrating. I would be pretty irritated. Did you call her and complain?

Me and my mom were at this grocery store recently and this guy started following us outside the store and then again inside the store it was so scary!	I would be scared too, what did he look like, like a creepy clown?

Well I knew he was following us and so I asked the manager to walk us out to the car and when he did we saw the guy come out again from between the two buildings b/c he was waiting on us.  so scary!	What grocery store were you at this at?
Did I tell you what happened with Li the other night? Boy do I feel dumb.	Uh oh, tell me what happened!

She's 45 minutes late to our anniversary dinner. I don't know what happened to me but I called and left an angry message. Turns out, she had gotten T-boned at an intersection and was talking to the Police Officer when I called!	I'm not sure how that happened. It's not like I'm a smart person.
Ugh! I looked like such a fool at my girlfriend's work party!	What happened? Did everyone get together and throw a trash can in the trash?

Well, I ended up having way too much to drink. One of her co-workers had a bottle of Fireball (gross I KNOW) and was making everybody do shots. I didn't want to look foolish, so I had... well too many.	Hahahaha. That must have been funny. Did everyone end up understanding?
Did I tell you what happened with the concert I was supposed to go to Saturday?	No. But I really really really hope that you had fun...

Well first of all, it wasn't just any concert - it was Jay-Z and Beyonce! AND IT GOT RAINED OUT!	Did you hear that? The rain didn't get to me. I was so jealous of the Jay and Beyonce performance that I decided to drive up to the parking deck just to get a photo with them!
You are never going to guess who was sleeping on the couch when I got home from New York...	Whoa! Did you tell them, and how long were you gone for?
My friend Benny! The one we all thought died in a monsoon in Thailand!	Whoa that's crazy, was he a nice guy or a freak, or what?

Recently, my husband came home from grocery shopping and had gifts for me for Mother's Day. He had a beautiful diamond ring and other lovely gifts, it was very unexpected!	That sounds like a pleasant surprise!
I did! I also gave him unexpected gifts and he was super happy. I was very touched by him being so thoughtful!	He must really love you very much!
I know I shouldn't count my chicks before they hatch, but I'm feeling pretty good after that interview today!	Hatched eggs are expensive to get rid of.
This advertising company! The owner was there - you should have seen his face. My last freelance project was a real winner. Think I got it?	Oh wow! I bet that was an excellent feeling!
Did I ever tell you about the time I "got taken hostage"?	No

As a heart attack. It was me and Big C at the World's Largest Pistachio. All of the sudden we hear gunshots, and DiDi's still in the car. We ran in the building, and he comes flying in after us. He never pointed the gun at us, and we ended up running away when he was distracted. It's too crazy - I can't make this up. Just glad to be alive!	Big shoes to fill, that sounds tragic.

I went to visit a friend one day and her boyfriend made a pass at me. He actually suddenly kissed me, as I was waiting for my friend to return. I couldn't believe his nerve!	That is some crazy stuff.  How'd it go?

I quietly pushed him away, as I didn't want my friend to hear. I was so shocked and upset, since he knew I wouldn't want to make a scene and took advantage.	That sounds so crazy! I'm glad your friend didn't do anything like that!

This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped cooling! We had to go the weekend without it, and of course had to deal with some unpleasant smells and throw away a large amount of food! It wasn't a fun weekend for us!	Oh that's terrible. Did it take you long getting it fixed?

Yes, and of course we tried to call and have someone come out, but to no avail! You don't realize how much you rely on things like that until they aren't working!	That's a shame. Do you have any repair plans available for it?

I felt pretty bad when I was having girl talk with my friend and we were talking about our partners. Her boyfriend had made a pass at me, but I never told her about it.	Oh, no. That sounds like trouble. How do you feel about that?

I felt bad, but she wasn't working and taking care of her grandchild, and her boyfriend was the financial support. I knew it would really be hard on her if she found out, not to mention she really loves him.	I am glad it worked out for you guys
I was at the mall and hug my mom and said to her: Time to go Mommy! and i wasnt her, can you imagine my reaction to it?	i can imagine it to. Did everything go okay? she must be proud of you
Yes, totally but at the moment i felt like the stupidiest person on earth, didn't know were to hide! and my mom was watching	I'm glad she was understanding! Sometimes we forget how much a "mommy" is.

THe good thing about it, was the lady, she was laughing and later told me that it has happened to her childrens to, no worries!	I am looking forward to going on vacation in a few weeks! We have a condo reserved on the beach, with fantastic ocean views. I'm ready!	That sounds wonderful! Where is the condo at?
Well, we are staying at Panama City Beach, so we're right there at the Gulf of Mexico.	Wow! That sounds awesome! I love the gulf. Do you guys have jet-ski lessons first?

I am definitely a proud parent of our 15 year old -- she was determined to work this summer, and even with us saying no one would hire her until 16 -- she found a job!	That's great! What kind of job did she get?

That, and she's enjoying the independence of having her own money. Remember that? Making money that you truly could use for your *pleasure* (and not just necessities ?! ;-))	She must have felt so accomplished. I wish I had the drive to do that. You sound like an awesome parent.

Same! I was surprised 15 year olds *can* actually work during the summer. It's just finding an employer who knows those hours get cut WAY back once school starts.	Okay, a silly pet peeve but one nonetheless -- when people just leave their grocery carts willy-nilly in the parking lot. No consideration for others or the people who work at the store!	Oh my gosh! I have never done that, but I hate that. It's inconsiderate and just causes more mess and drama.
Me too. And I will always make sure to at *least* put it in one of those cart corrals, if not walk it back up to the store. Hey -- extra exercise ;-)	Some people are just jerks! That's annoying.
WE CAN SAVE THE WOOOOOOORLD!!!!! (lol indeed....!)	I came home, and my wife showed me a picture in 4d of our future baby, my heart speeded so fast!	You must be so excited!
We choose to wait! but the amount of happiness in my body is tremendous! never felt this way before.	That is awesome!  I am happy that she is your wife!  You must be very excited.

Yes, God willing the baby is going to be healthy in every way! can wait to ave the second	I love being in the "flow" -- whether it's in speaking to a group of people or working to help facilitate meetings.	That's so beautiful! How do you get to that "Flow" usually- speaking?

I work with different organizations on strengthening their culture, and I do large-scale visual notetaking (also known as graphic recording). Are you familiar with that at all? (Not unusual NOT to be!)	Oh I've done that before actually! And no I'm not familiar with that either.

That's one of the huge benefits -- learning about many different industries and subjects!	I LOVE when leaders know that it actually *helps* them to be surrounded by strong people -- people they can learn from, that challenge them, and that in some ways could be considered "better".	I agree! Leaders should put all their money into running a successful business or business rather than just sitting around doing nothing!
It's just too many leaders want "yes men" and/or people who feel non-threatening. It's a trap and a quick path to mediocrity, if not failure!	leader like that is exactly why we needless to be humble

I'll always remember the day I learned I was pregnant with our first child -- Halloween in Chicago, and we were with friends at the Shedd Aquarium! I've loved baby belugas since ;-)	That's awesome! I'm glad you had such an awesome day.

Ha! True that ;-) That's also the year that A Bug's Life came out, and we always thought of our young one as "Dot", the spunky little girl ant in the movie.	Ha ha! That's funny, because that's the name of one of our pets in the movie! I was also at the Shedd aquarium as well. I'm glad you made a special trip there and enjoyed the experience!
This mother's day was amazing! I got so much more than expected and it was all so heartfelt	That sounds great!  I am so happy for you.
Yes, definitely! I actually cried a few times because of how much thought went into each gift and what was written in the cards	That's awesome! What a wonderful day to be alive!
THat's too bad. What do you think went wrong?	I don't know. I wish someone will help me. I am very depressed and suicidal.
Did they give you any feedback?	I think so but I don?Ât understand why it won?Ât let you off the hook for the second offense?
That is a shame, you need to learn from your mistakes.	I did but they said I didn't listen so well.

So my sister told us a couple weeks ago she was pregnant. Her and her husband are so excited. I hope they have an amazing 9 months and then an amazing time raising the baby.	That is so exciting! I am sure it will go very well!
I was very surprised. She didn't tell a single person they were trying for a baby. Just announced it on the 4th of July	Congratulations!  That's so exciting!  I'm so happy for you and your family!

Yes, they put a picture of their sonogram on the tv and waited for someone to notice it. So exciting	Oh no, what did you do instead? Did you watch Netflix?	Ha ha, no I had to cancel my cable subscription.  I tried rewiring the router but it would take forever!
Yes, I do. I recently watched the series "Dark." It's the German one.	I watched netflix last week actually. I was quite happy
It's a supernatural mystery type. I won't spoil the twist.	What is the twist?

It was fantastic, a lot of people have been comparing it to Stranger Things, but its a lot more grime and serious.	I went to a court hearing for unemployment with my former employer, and I felt great about it since I was so prepared with all of the documents and everything I needed to show the court I was in the right for quitting.	That's great! You worked so hard for that chance!
Yes, I actually ended up winning it and they gave me 6 months of unemployment pay.	Wow that's amazing! Good for you!

Yes I am currently working as a processing assistant at a warehouse. I love it. Much better than my last job	Today traffic was horrible and was so frustrating!	I know! It takes me an extra 20 minutes or so in traffic to go a decent city park! So aggravating!
Yes! People were constantly cutting me off,not signalling and slamming on their brakes	Oh man! I bet that was aggravating! Were you on your phone when it happened?

When I was a kid, I went to this group with other kids my age, it was in a big gym. There were kids of different ages, and one of the kids (8 years old or so) was picking on the littler kids. Yeah, I was pretty amazed in the moment, he was flat as a board in mid air before he landed flat on his face. So, I ran towards where the parents were seated, stopped when I turned the corner, and walked calmly over to my mom, taking a seat on her lap. I love that moment when I see the kids going through the process of the gym, I'm like, what are we talking about six years old, I don't need to be in pain but I want to be in pain. Yeah, I should have just said that. Honestly though, my favorite places to drink.	Where are you from originally. I'm Filipino.

I honestly hope to. Every time I look at it I remember the good times we had together.	Thats really sweet of you. I hope to one day get the same kind of memories from my father.

going near hights really makes me scared	I thinkights are great! Are you always alone?
just instinc i think i have always been afraid of heights	i am glad that you don't afraid to heights, i mean i'm scared i wouldn't make it to them at all
During carnival season, there is a big rave at an undisclosed location in the middle of the night.	Sounds wild! What do they usually do in the crowds?
They are a lot of fun! I must admit though, I was pretty nervous when the cops showed up to shut it down.	That does sound scary

Well, there were only two officers and a couple hundred of us. By the time we were all walking away from the warehouse, I was actually laughing.	my girl friend broke up with me about a month ago	Aww man, that sucks man. I'm sorry.
we where just not getting along, and did not h ave enough time to see each other	That's really sad to hear about that but also to hear stories like this. Are you guys distant now?
yes we are	I was always terrified of haunted houses when I was little.	Me too! Did something happen to make you think so?

Glad I'm not the only one! My friend has a birthday in October and she wanted us to go to one as a group. I'm still not sure if I'll go,	October scares me to death. I think I would pass out! LOL. Maybe if I'm being honest with you..I'm still pretty young and haven't had a decent amount of sleep since Halloween, so I don't really know much about them.

well it is not really her fault it just makes me angry hahah	How do yo feel about that? Maybe she should consider seeing a counselor?

california, i really hope i get to go to universal studios	Universal Studios is a blast! Have you gone there many times?

nothing at all. I was kinda depressed	Oh that is depressing. Why were you alone?

Trust me it all paid off. When I went in to take the test, I was absolutely solid on the material.	Thats great! Did you already have all the answers down?
Felt sad when she left for 3 weeks	I'm sure she missed ya'll
To see her family. It sucked though because my car had broken down.	That is really bad timing. Are you ok? What happened to your car.
I am happy with where we are now living	That's a good thing. A lot of people would be happier if their lives were less stress.
A very nice complex with 3 pools!	thats nice

The interviewer made all the comments you'd expect from a good interview and seemed to respond well to my answers.	That is awesome. Im happy to hear that! Im sure that you got a great answer!

I shot so-so, but my friend ended up winning the table and beating 5 guys in a row.	People can be really random like that. I'm glad for you and the pool guy!

Yes, I'll still attend but the extra help would've been nice.	That's too bad. You must feel disappointed about that, but maybe there will be another opportunity that you're interested in pursuing.
I know things will work out in God's perfect timing	That is the best feeling.  I am grateful for it.
Yes I am. For everything we want for the baby to be gifted to us lol	What things do you want for the baby to be gifted?

Yes, she is. My family and I are very happy with her accomplishments.	That's great to hear, I'm really happy for your family as well!
I like being alone, but not feeling bad when no one is around to talk to	I can understand being lonely
It's true I do need my alone time	I can understand that
Dog ate grass and then threw up	That is disgusting. What are you going to do about it/
Well she was ok. Shouldn't have been so silly	That's pretty gross! I wonder what got her in the situation to have that happen
I am so happy to be having a boy	A who, may I ask? Are you having a boy or girl?
Thanks. Yes it is. I already got a crib and baby bath.	That is awesome, I have a boy on the way aswell.  How many kids do you have now?

I agree. I really wanted to do it myself, but it's something I'll never forget.	Was it a nice surprise?

To visit my family for about 3 weeks, I got married a few years ago and my husband and I live pretty far from them now.	Wow that sounds wonderful!  Did you take lots of pictures?

Yes, just very nerve racking dealing with the international flights and passport checks and security checks. Definitely an experience.	I was very proud of her for flying all by herself	Where did she fly?
Especially with 2 full suitcases	Where were her parents?
I don't generally trust people.	Why is that
Upbringing. Dad use to say never trust anyone before I left for school every morning	Why do you not trust people?
You just can't trust people any more. My mechanic told me it was going to be $1000 to fix my Jeep.	Wow!  That's nuts!!!  I would be livid if it were me!!!
Turns out, nothing much at all. A guy down the street got it running for $100.	Wow! I'm impressed you got it running for that cheap!
I am so happy that we're having a baby boy	Congratulations! Boy or girl?
Yes it is. I am over the moon	Congratulations! I'm happy for you! When is he?
I've just successfully completed my first international flight/trip by myself.	Wow! That's awesome! Where did you guys on your trip?
Yes, I got to see my family so it was great! I had to be very organized. The flights and layovers were kind of intense.	Wow! Where did you go?

She met up with her ex to return his t-shirt..	That is disappointing.  I hope that she wasn't upset about the shirt being returned.  It was probably for good reason.
I am currently expecting my first baby, it's a boy!	Congratulations! What is the name?
October, right around the corner!	wow that is so awesome! congrats

I had a blast! It's supposedly a four hour float but we were out there for eight!	Wow that does sound like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to go tubing!
My girlfriend's dog was a 17 year old Chihuahua who emerged from a bathroom at a party in 1999.	Did you have to run away? That is a horrible dog

He just sort of showed up and no one knew where he came from. He passed away recently after running away from our friends farm and being struck by a car.	That is terrible, I know the feel, my friend's dog is a 19 year old Spanish Bichon Friseoise. They say chihuahuas have high anxiety so I'm guessing he was stressed about his life. It's sad to lose such a sweet dog.
I can't believe my girlfriend was still interested in me after she saw the slum I was living in.	Wow, I am sorry to hear about that. Do you have other women?
Something like that. My room was in shambles and the house was falling apart! I was mortified when she asked to come inside.	That is terrible. I am sorry.
Once after a night on the town, I came home and my room had been ransacked.	What happened?
The thing is, my alcoholic room mate was the culprit. He had even thrown some of my belongings in the bathtub!	That would make me mad, did he get a warning?

I am expecting my first child. It is going to be a boy! We are preparing the nursery and getting everything in order for his arrival!	Congratulations! I am sure you will be an awesome parent! You have my genes :)
Yes, it is!	Congratulation! I am so thrilled for you!

A few months back, one of my girlfriend's close friends died from a heroin overdose.	Oh my god. That's absolutely devastating. I am so sorry. That's one the hardest drugs I've ever tried to get through, and it's one I've never tried before.
I only met him a few times, but he touched a lot of people's lives.	That is terrible, I feel sorry for your friend, I hope he has a long life
An extremely timid girl in my physics class invited the class to see her band play at a bar downtown.	What kind of band was it?
I actually went last Friday night. Turns out she is an incredible guitarist - a real shredder!	What a strange turn of events. How did you feel when you saw her playing?
I am pretty sure everyone is scared of being trapped in an elevator, and I can confirm it's quite a shock.	Really, what makes you so sure?

Yes just a couple weeks ago. The elevator screeched to a halt and the lights went out, and I have to confess I screamed.	I would have screamed as well!  I can remember being scared out of my mind when I was trapped in an elevator.  What a crazy feeling!
I thank God every day for the many blessings. Especially our new home	Congratulations. Are you in a new home?
5 months ago now. It's really nice here, there are 3 swimming pools	That's great!  I wish I had a swimming pool!  You must be so happy!
Right after I had my baby, my husband worked second shift, so he didn't get home until around 2am.	Did you still have work?

Yeah, but it wasn't really a problem, until one night around 11pm. I was changing her diaper. The changing table was in front of a window, and I could hear people running up and down the porch in front of the window and they were banging on the house.	Oh wow! That's crazy!  Did it take long at all?

I'm not sure. Doors and windows were locked, but I was so relieved when my husband got home.	I'm a youth leader, and just the other day a teen from the group was asked to speak at a local church.	Did he get chosen to speak at that church?? That's awesome!

He was nervous, he has to prepare an original message. He did really good, and he really showed and understanding of the bible.	That sounds very interesting! What was his original message, and how was it received by the church?
Thank you.	I get so mad when I have to repeat myself	I know exactly what you mean!  It's the worst!  Do you ever remember the first time?
I know. But it makes me stressed out	What do you repeat?
Hello ... today I am happy, we go with my children to the movies and then to eat pizza	That sounds like fun! I love doing movies too. What kind of movie do they want to see most?
The incredible ... they love ... it's going to be fun	That sounds so great! I love pizza!
Thank you very much and you too..	Graduating from college was a load off my shoulders.	I can understand the stress, what are you going for
Thanks, it was a long journey.	What are you studying?

Someone else interviewed who had much more experience than I did.	I'm sorry. I know how hard it is to feel like that.

It was for work so I had to do it, but I typically avoid those places as well	Yeah I don't like sketchy areas either. What kind of job did you pick up?

We went to a friend's house the other day for dinner. I was helping her cook. I was following the directions of a recipe and accidentally cracked her baking dish.	Uh oh! Did she get upset with you for it or were you trying to be nice?  I hope it wasn't too hard to fix, it happens.
Yes, I did, but she wouldn't even hear of it. She told me it was fine.	That's good that you followed the recipe and didn't get too irritated with her
I am looking forward to moving into a easy place to take care of.	That's a good thing. Are you moving for a new home?
No, not moving soon, only wanting to and looking around to see what is affordable.	That's so awesome!  I'm moving in with my sister next week!  affordable apartment?  yay

Definitely! And they are paying me back, so it isn't like I'm losing money either.	They are definitely giving you back a little bit. That is wonderful.

Hahahaha! Well, I guess we can make light of even our worst moments.	Oh no, that's terrible. Did he take it the other way?
My eldest son just graduated High School I was so proud.	That's amazing! Congratulations! I know you must be very proud of him!
It's kind of a surreal feeling tho, hard to accept that he is grown.  Now college is about to start.	That is so exciting! You must be so happy for him!

The time just flys by doesn't it?  It hard to imagine that they dont need you so much anymore.	So a customer just came into my work and started yelling at me for something that wasn't my fault. I hate when people do that!	Customer service is so important. Did you say something to them?
No, I didn't yell back haha. I would get fired.	Customer service is so important. You must have a very good relationship with them if they would do that!
Retail, yep.	It makes me angry when people never notice me	Why is that? Do you always look through your mirror at the moment?
Everything. I don't have friends so it's nice to get noticed	I'm sorry you're so lonely.  Are you always lonely or do you have people around you a lot?
I get excited when I go swimming	Is it a pleasurable experience?
The fact of relaxing in a large pool of water. It just grabs my attention	i love doing that too. i can't swim though :(
My wife wasn't feeling so well, so I took care of her and made her some soup <3	Good of you. I love soup.
She is much better now! I love her so much, so I try to take good care of her.	Aww I love soup. That's so nice you guys took care of her!
I am so grateful to my family	Yes. No family can do that for you.
They help me with whatever I need and they are always their for me.	I'm so grateful to my family They help me with whatever I need and they are always supportive!
I was surprised when my parents threw me a party	Oh that must have been awesome!
It really was. I am pretty thankful for them	That's nice that you have such a good parents! Was it your birthday or a party?
A big wind storm blew through town and uprooted one of the trees in my yard.	Oh no, that's awful. I hope no damage was done.
No, but that was my fear. I kept waiting to hear the sound of a branch or tree hitting my roof, or breaking glass.	Oh wow. I guess it was really lucky for you to not die during that storm
I took my dog to an agility competition and she ended up winning first place!	Congrats! How big is she now? :)
Thanks so much! It did, but she's so hard-working and I couldn't have done it without her.	You're very welcome! I can't believe no one else would show her some love!
I was sad when my parents left me	Oh no. Why are they leaving?
I stay with my older sister now	That's awful. How did they leave you?

My brother got a really high-paying job and now spends all his time flaunting his money.	oh, flaunting is a good way of putting people in your shoes. I hope he really appreciates the good job and can quit his bad habit.

Not very well! I mostly just stew and complain about it and wish I had his money and lifestyle.	I feel you.My brother is doing the same thing. He is 17 and has a good job, but he also seems to be getting more interested in female strippers. I don't think he is very well off yet.
I was disgusted when my food had a hair in it	I hate when my food had a hair in it too!  What does that mean??  Did you put the food in a hair dryer??
Yeah I got a refund. They were very sorry about it and I forgave them	That is not cool.  What did they forgive you?
I was anxious when I went to the theme park	Did it make you ride a lot of rides? theme parks are always stressful for me as well.
The roller coasters	They are really well made! Did you ride any?

I am not sure. He told me he was sorry afterwards but I didn't listen to him	That is rude!
I feel so lonely because I have no friends	I'm sorry to hear you feel lonely.  I have the same feeling- I hardly have social media anymore :(  Do you have any outside friends?
I haven't. Im too shy and I am scared of what people will say	I understand, but don't feel scared, talk to people!
I was jealous when my girlfriend was talking to other guys	How come? Is everything okay?
I do not. I have trust issues	Well you should have no issues with that

I did but it was really a challenge for me.	Horrible! I bet that was hard! What was the movie about?

I just dont know why she would marry me then.	She might just be an enabler.
My family and I went to the beach on Tues and spent the whole day there.	Sounds lovely! Did you make any special gift?
One small thunderstorm but other than that great! I'm amazed I didn't really get burnt!	Sounds amazing! I love the sound of rain, especially when it's hot.
When someone talks down to me, it makes me sad	I feel the exact opposite.  Its the exact opposite of what they would want to do
I am just too shy to say anything. I dont know how	I feel the same way. It's very rude and annoying.
I am super joyful when my family comes together to eat dinner	That's so nice! How many people do you have?
Usually once a week. Its a great feeling	That is really nice to have. Do they enjoy eating together?
I was surprised when my parents threw me a big party	I bet you were happy! What were they doing to surprise you?
It was. I had a great time	Was it your first time?
I am so annoyed that people are so mean to other people	I know the feeling. I wish people didn't treat each other so so so poorly. Have you had a experience like this recently/
That is so true! I dont know where this world is heading.	Where is it headed? I can not afford all of my bills.
I get so jealous when my parents don't pay me any attention.	Why is that
I haven't because I don't know how to start that conversation.	I am sorry you feel that way.  Try not to be jealous too much!
I was furious when my dog ate the wires to my Television	Was the television working?

Yeah but it will take a few days because I have to wait for my paycheck	Wow! Did it eat the wires? That would explain a lot, since those are the cheap parts, and they're the cheap wires, too! What do you plan on doing about it?
So what happens in the middle of the night? I got woken, again, by my upstairs neighbor thumping around. Does she have to be so rude?!	That would be annoying! Have you told her?

No, they don't. Well, this time I've had enough. I've told management I want into another apartment and explained exactly why!	Oh wow. Maybe she thought you were being rude. I would tell management too.

Not really, but the alternative is to go slowly mad. These blessed individuals stomp around day and night, screeching into their cellphones - they're horrible.	I am a very trusting person. It gets me in trouble sometimes.	Why do people get in trouble?  Are they doing it for the wrong reasons?
People take advantage of me	I'm sorry, that must suck to have that happen sometimes.
I'm only 6 months away from having my AA in Healthcare Administration.	That's awesome. I hope you enjoy your new job and have an awesome experience!
I really am, I can't wait to start my new career!	Congratulations! I am sure you are excited to begin your career too.
Going to the dentist always has me on edge. I hate it!	I know.  I always dread going there
I know...it's a necessary evil. But it hurts so much!	It's definitely painful.  What's worse is when you have to wait in lines.  The dentist gives you one extra payment for being so close!
One of my very dear friends got his dream job recently. He was so diligent in finding information and contacts. I so respect what he's achieved.	That's great! Does he know what kind of job it is?
Well, it takes perseverance and a bit of luck, but you can do it!	Yeah, I can relate. It takes quite some luck, and I'm sure if you work hard at it, you can achieve it too!
Lol, you and me both. You could always marry a Kardashian!	hahahaha good one!

Or someone not quite so objectionable :) Seriously though, I'm so happy for K with his new job.	We started watching a Red Sox game near the end and they were losing. Next thing you know, they were ahead four runs.	That's baseball! That is exciting!
Yes, usually I think so too. But this was really fun to watch and we were so happy because it did not look good at first.	That is very exciting! I am glad you had fun watching it!
My car that I hate is going to die soon and I'll be able to get a new one. Score!	Nice, what year?
I'm thinking something reliable. Maybe a toyota or mazda.	Those seem like good choices. You're very lucky

heck no, i told my husband to deal with it. i ran in my bedroom and locked the door	That is terrifying. I am glad he closed it

Well, don't you know, one of my neighbors who works for AA was in San Francisco recently and saw some Scottish cheese (I'm Scottish). So she bought some and brought it to me. How nice of her to do that!	That's awesome, what type of cheesecake was it

This particular one was a cheddar and it tends to be from smaller producers and is creamier and more flavorful than the cheeses we typically get here.	That's a shame. Scottish cheeses are typically expensive so that had to be a pain to get a hold of.

Ooh, I haven't tried Cabot. Must look out for it. The cheddar I normally get is from Tillamook. I think it's from Oregon. Where's Cabot from?	Interesting! I have no idea where either of those places comes from. I will definitely be on the lookout!

I've never done that. Wonder if there's a cheese factory near me. I'm in NC, where the people almost all seem as nice as my kind neighbor!	People are so much more open and helpful here than in other places I have lived. Mustangs are so easy to steal from, too! I'm surprised cabott isn't more popular

my brother would've turned 34 today. he died 2 years ago and It still hurts so much	Oh man. Sorry to hear that. Was he in an accident or was he in the course of his life when he died. Either way it still sucks.
yes we were. He moved to the different country but we spoke pretty often	Oh man. Sorry to hear about that.
I had planned to go to the beach with friends, but it looks like it's going to rain.	time for Plan B
Nah, it said there's be thunder and lightning, so looks like we're stuck inside :(	Lightening is the worst... atleast its not going to rain

I did, Yes. Work has been hectic lately so i was really looking forward to unwinding with them.	That's cool. It can really kick your butt when you have time to spend time with them after a long week of work.
We ate good food, drank wine and went swimming.	I bet that was fun! What did you do after you unwinded?
It was, kind of hot but not enough to complain about.	That sounds great! I love swimming! Did you have to get up really early for it? I hope it didn't get to hot to swim in!
I hate how our country is so divided right now	How so
True. I hope we can become less divided in the future and solve things	I do not like how our country is divided either. I hope things get better for you, too.

My father passed away about 2 years ago. It was so very difficult for me and very unexpected. We didn't know he had a life-threatening illness and weren't prepared in any way for his sudden departure from us.	Sorry for the delay but I have a very similar situation in my life and it's really rough too. Just got back to work and it's so very tough still.

Yes, my family and I are close and we were there for each other. But, my sister had passed away around 6 years before, by committed suicide. The last few years have been very difficult.	sorry to hear that, thats very sad
I feel like a terrible sibling right now.	Why do you think that? Is there something in the water?
My sister, who lives out of state and i don't see often, was recently in town visiting our dad. I didn't visit with them.	Oh that is sad. Do they visit you often at least?
I am going to a concert very soon.	That sounds fun, what band?
Imagine Dragon and Grace Vanderwhall, do you know them?	No, I don't. Who are they?

Yes she was.	Our new property management person is remarkably efficient. She emailed me details of a conversation we had yesterday. The others promise the earth and don't deliver!	That's good, it can sometimes be a lot to handle
It is. I've been trying to switch apartments for months and this is the first time someone has actually done anything about it.	I would be a mess. I'd switch again
Absolutely! I move September 1st. No more stompy screechy neighbors at 3 am!!	School for my kids started again this past Thursday.	Oh wow! Did you make any changes for school yearbooks?

It was good. I am dealing with a mixture of both emotions about them being back in school. I was happy I had all the supplies, clothes, shoes, and other odds and ends in time.	I imagine it is a lot to prepare for, do they enjoy the class?
I had planned a beach trip about a month before we actually went.	Was it a good idea at least? I've always wanted to go to Outer Banks National Park!
We went to Virginia Beach earlier this week. I was so giddy up that whole month I could barely contain myself.	Did it turn out to be worth the trip?
My husband, 2 kids and my mother. My kids had never been to the beach.	I've only been to one and it sucked! I'm sure you are happy about it.
I bought a ticket last week for the lottery, when it was over 100 million dollars.	Wow! How much did you pay for?
I was so excited watching the numbers being drawn, but no I didn't win. But someone did! I'm sure they were happy.	That's really awesome. How much is the prize?
True, but it would be fun spending that money.	My husband just found out he will start getting a monthly bonus! This was unexpected and great news	That is really good for him!
It sure does. It came as a shock, but a pleasant one.	That's awesome! How much is it and where does he go to get it?
I just went today to visit my son in his new house.	How was that?
It was great! He has saved for so long to buy it.	That's awesome. It's always good when a parent can just go buy a "good" house and not have to ask for help from anyone else!
So tonight we are suppose to go eat out as a family but I cant get a single one of my family members to agree on a place.  So frustrating!	That's the worst! Have they been wanting to eat together?

That's actually not a bad idea.  Wish I had come up with that earlier.  It seems everyone wants something different.	Everyone likes what they like right? If they won't agree then that's their loss and you can go ahead and do it that way, it's not a big deal!
Im going to have to sue that for next week.  I think this week they can all go make PB&J since they want to be difficult.	You might be on to something there.  You might be saving a lot of money too
I guess that way the wallet wins every once and awhile too!  lol	I'm so happy that it is Friday!	Me too! Do you have any plans for Friday?

Somewhat, I work 4 10 hour shifts and have a random off day during the week. Yesterday was my off day. What about you?	I have one day off this week and then I have two days off this month! I love those offs.
feels disappointed because my friend fights with me	That sucks. Have you asked to fight against your friend?
no i can't because i love him a lot	That sucks. Have they talked to you about it?

yes, but they are quite powerful which I am trying to avoid.  I am already on one and I am hoping that through this diet I can get off b/c the next steps won't be fun	I am sorry to hear that! I hope the diet works for you!

Oh man, that is a tough situation to be in. Did she speak to her teacher, or did they just tell her that band fees went to your tuition?

It might not be when my wife returns and sees it gone. I look super guilty right now.	Eww. Maybe you shouldn't do that again.

I could, I might have to buy her some of her favorite chocolate.	I was at the park today and almost stepped on a rattle snake. I almost jumped out of my skin.	I would have totally jumped out of my skin! I hate snakes so much, especially ones with sharp be heads! Did you get hurt doing it, at least?

I hope so, but I am really missing them right now. I didn't want to go alone.	That's too bad, are you going to see someone new?

I was thinking about graphic design. Or, I was going to do something practical like Nursing.	Nurse! That's sounds like an amazing passion! Are you already in school?

Well at first I was a little discouraged because I wasn't making that much. Things have picked up recently though, and I feel I will be able to help him a good bit so I'm feeling better about it.	That's great. I think it is important for couples to work towards a better financial future.

I don't want to have problems. This is why I check in with him.	Making the relationship better is important. Having an open relationship is great.

Yes, it is. I know that time heals.	It does, and it does. But, in this day and age, it's hard to imagine someone not caring what you think.

I'm always curious to see what kind of gifts they would want from you.  It would be interesting to see what kind of gifts they'd want to receive in return.

Thank you. I wrote down a list of questions and key points beforehand.	That's good, interview nerves can really get to someone head.

I missed her while she was gone. We have a mixed breed rescue pup.	That is so sad. I hope you are doing alright.

Sometimes. It doesn't stop me from doing things, just slows me down and takes longer than it should to do the things I need to do.	That sounds so frustrating! I am sure there is something wrong.

Yeah they do! Some times I wish I got to go visit grandma's like they do lol.	Aw that's so sweet, I love visiting my grandma. Does she live close to you?

I was really happy when my nephew was born, Sadly i was informed he had cystic fibrosis, a genetic disease.	I am sorry to hear that, but happy that he got a healthy baby, that is what is most important
He's doing about as well as he can be. Very healthy, but without some new discoveries he will likely have a shortened lifespan.	Oh, that's very sad. I'm happy for your loss though!

Not too much. I only put in what I could afford to lose.	That is unfortunate.  I have had that happen to me before.

Thanks. I dont think so. He has seemed fine otherwise. I've watched him on our security cam today and he seems fine. He is a mutt from a local shelter.	Maybe he had a bath or took a nap on your property!

Well I have the opportunity, but rarely have the time to really devote to it.	Congrats! I know that feeling at times where you have more time to spend working on something you really want.

Next week I am off work and going to the beach.	Oh, that sounds awesome! What beach?
No I am going with my wife and her family. But we all get along great so it should be fun.	That should be so much fun!  The beach is really popular where you are going.  Where are you going?
Amen. It is much needed. Ready for some sun and a drink with an umbrella.	That sounds lovely.  Where ya headed to?

The whole vacation! I was so upset! I didn't have anything to wear for the duration.	That's awful!  I am so sorry that you had to go through that!

Yeah i really did not see it coming at all.	That is very sweet, I bet you were shocked when she got you an apple watch!

Absolutely. I certainly won't say no to that.	Nice! Did he notice or did you not get a raise?

I may have to if that happens. We are making it now, but if the car goes it will be pretty tough.	Dang, hopefully the budget tightness isn't gonna keep you from spending more?
It is ok. We are probably too proud to take help anyway. We will make it.	It will be a tough situation. But you must do it! You got this.
So I recently went through some old boxes and found some of my childhood dolls. It brought back a lot of memories!	That is always a nice thing when you get a chance to remember a past!
Absolutely! I remember having so much fun with them dressing them up. My sister and I would play for hours.	I love dressing up with my kids! It is so fun!
So, i may be in the market for a new laptop or a repair at least, thanks to a little mishap.	What happened?
My daughter tripped on the cord and it smashed on the ground, not sure if it can be saved. I was pretty angry.	That would really upset me too. How are you trying to clean the cord?
I woke up the other morning, got ready and drove all the way to work. Just to find out it was a holiday and we had the day off.	Did you have plans for the day after?
I know, but the extra day of work was nice. Especially since I wasn't expecting it.	Driving always feels extra special on a Sunday, no matter what.
It was wonderful. I ended up being twice as productive since I got up early.	I know the feeling. It is wonderful to wake up early to extra work. I hope that it continues. :)
My new job is starting tomorrow. I'm feeling nervous, but really optimistic about it.	Congratulations.  What will you be doing?
It's a job they opened up for graphic design! I'm super excited to get started and learn more from them.	It is always a good sign when you have a fresh new experience. It will drive you hard

He thinks he does.  All I can think of is a bunch of Tiny Titans in helmets running around like chicks in a barnyard.  *chuckle*	You are going to have some nostalgia tears, my friend. But I'm sure he will have fun.
I put in a job application for a new job. I am fairly certain that my credentials are enough to get me the job.	What type of job is it?
I was, I go in next Tuesday. I am pretty excited for them to give me the job.	Excited for you. Is it a pretty demanding job?

Me too, we shall see. Now the waiting begins!	I got a call about job with a good company that is in my line of work.	That's great! I have a friend who got a job with a company that is in his line of work recently.
No, but I have the necessary experience, and I'm optimistic that it will work out.	That is great, you must be really excited, but also know that the right person is always in demand!
I went to the petstore with my dog and he had an accident in front of everyone. He had the saddest look on his face.	That's sad. Did he get hurt or just miss?

I'm not sure. It was a little awkward and stressful.	I bet that was!  Were you nervous about it?

Maybe, I haven't been back because I can't afford to go right now. I've just been dealing with the pain.	Oh my that's really bad! I really hope you can get some answers to your pesky pain!

Yeah!  We had a group of really talented kids, and some very good [and patient] coahes!	The other day, my three year old didn't know I was paying attention to her while she was playing with the dog. I overheard her trying to teach the dog how to count to ten.	Oh no! That must have been frightening, I can imagine how the dog felt!
Yes, I thought that was pretty good for a three year old. When I asked her about it she said they were playing school. Haha.	Haha, that's cute, sounds like a fun day at school
I'm very proud of her.	That's a nice surprise!  Did she enjoy it?

I babysat and worked odd jobs all summer when i was younger to save up and buy a sega dreamcast.	That's really nice! I used to also play a lot of video games when I was a kid, but I never got into them. I ended up buying the SNES instead!
Yep, i've never looked forward to something so much in my life. I still have the dreamcast as well.	I love the SNES version, I played it a lot as a kid
I'm gonna need your support here, because I'm going through something a little bit rough, okay?	I'm here for you.

I'm 29 years old and I woke up to find that I'd wet the bed last night. I'm...not even sure how. I didn't drink a whole lot before bed or anything.	Oh no that's rough. I hope you feel better. Drink lots of water and take some Gatorade.

Should I see a therapist or anything? Is this indicative of some deep-seated problem that I'm not aware of?	I'm not sure what other people may have had as far as deep- rooted problems but I've never wet the bed before! I think you might have just woke up to a random number on the lottery ticket, lol!

My Uncle Jebodiah is always looking out for me. He recently told me that he had a special concoction that if I drank it, it would cure my herpes.	Well, that sounds like a pretty awesome uncle...and I suppose as time passed, it probably didn't really work. But, at least it was something you were willing and able to try, and that your uncle knew about.
Listen, my Uncle Jeb wouldn't do me dirty like that. You may call it """snake oil""" but I call it the miracle cure this world needs. After all, it worked.	I am so happy you found that oil
My cat was kept overnight at the vets recently. I was so worried!	I bet! Did they find anything wrong with him?
She's fine now! They found out it was something minor after x-rays. I was so relieved.	aww, that's great! i love cats, they are so sweet and devoted
My car broke down on a busy highway the other day. There were so many cars zooming past me, it was scary!	Oh my, I hope you weren't hurt!  Did the police come?
My brother had to pick me up. He had to pull up behind me on the curb. It felt dangerous!	oh man. that sounds super scary

Look, can we just be honest with each other for a second? Having ebola shouldn't mean that I have to be grounded and miss out on my chance to walk on the moon during the upcoming lunar missions.	I agree, I am so sick over it too.

I saw one, and he said if I gave him $25,000 he would clear me for flight, but I don't have that kind of money just lying around. It's a real bummer. Now I just have to do super boring NASA desk work like tracking comets. Lame.	Maybe you could talk to a salesperson, they usually know what they are talking about

I don't know.  I just see stuff in the grocery store and think I like that food and buy it because it is on sale.  Even if I already have it!	That's pretty smart!  It makes you smart to always be prepared and to never let hindsight or research take over your life
My girlfriend's leg was bitten off by a bull shark last summer.	Wow, that's brutal. Were you scared?

She's fine now. I spent a month in the hospital with her, then was with her every day for three months while she was in rehab. She was out spreading sacrificial lamb's blood in the water on a fishing trip. Gotta love her.	Wow that's so cruel of them to do that.

It was swallowed whole, unfortunately. I just hope the shark seasoned it properly. I won't stand for underprepared human thigh meat. Gordon Ramsay wouldn't have it, and neither will I.	I forgot about plans that I had made with my mother over the weekend.	Was everything cancelled, or do they just take their sweet time making them?
I called her right up and we rescheduled! I felt so bad though.	That happened. Don't feel bad. It happens.

They think someone needs to take his phone away	That is strange, since he is a Brit...but I suppose it makes total sense given our relationship with Trump

Rita May. She used to mess with me by popping it out and showing me her empty eye socket just to get a laugh while she got drunk off of bourbon. Those were such good times.	I've always wanted an empty eye. That's so cool! I bet you really appreciated her.

Well In September, Universal Studios starts their Halloween Horror Nights events, after dark!  It's so much fun I can't wait to grab tickets.	Sounds like a lot of fun! Halloween is one of my favorites!

jumpfortherose.com	Someone helped me move.	Good for you! Moving can be so stressful.

I am so mad that our politicians won't do something to stop Russian hacking	That is very true, they don;t even try to hide it anymore

For 4 years. I'm bummed.	That's so sad. I'm really sorry about that, how old was he/she?

yeah I am going to see what it seems like tomorrow - not sure if something got in it that scratched it or what	Oh no. I hope it's nothing.

Yes. It seems like a great opportunity.	I hope it goes well for you!

I had a few drinks. I felt good.	Thats great!  Did you celebrate
So today my mother brought over a whole week of meals to help me out.	Wow, what a nice gesture. What did you guys make?
Yes, she's always helping me out! I am so thankful for her she's an amazing mother.	Wow that is very nice of her!  You are lucky to have such a good mother.  Do you often thankful for her?

Out of state. I'm by myself now, so it's pretty quiet! I miss them a lot.	That sounds lonely.  How far did you move?

My oldest child needed braces but her health insurance wouldn't cover the expense. It was close to 4000 dollars and we did not have that kind of money at the time.	That's too bad. I am sure that was tough, but I am glad you had the means to do it
Yes they do. My aunt paid half of the cost for us and didn't has for any of it back because she knew we needed the help.	That is very kind of your aunt.
I was sitting on the couch after a long day taking care of work and all the mommy stuff the other day.	Aww.  I know the feeling of taking care of kids during the day.  Did you have a pull out game?
It was! My family was happy and together. Chatting and watching tv. Everything just felt right.	Sounds wonderful! What was the stuff you were doing? I need some company in the evenings.
My husband used to work out of town in a different state Sunday through Thursday.	What was his/her desk job?

Yeah, he does work hard. Even thought my children were with me and we kept our usual routines, I was miserable when he was gone. I would cry after he left every Sunday. Luckily now, he has a job where he is home everyday by supper time.	That's good! I am glad he is able to keep his commitment and get to spend time together.

We really are, he brings out the best in me.	I didn't have a car to get to and from work, so my parents actually let me just keep theirs for a bit!	Wow that's lucky of them! You must've really grateful people!
Yeah it was so giving of them to leave it to me for so long and helped me a ton!	That was very nice of them! You are lucky to have such a caring family!
While driving today I went past my grandma's old house. She passed last year.	That's really sad. You must have felt sentimental you got passed down to you
Oh for sure. Good feelings, but I also miss her so much.	I'm so sorry. That's a hard thing to deal with. I bet that brought a tear to your eye?
I went outside to get my paper this morning. Someone had ran over my mailbox!	I hate when that happens! Did you catch them?
No, it's completely demolished! I'm feeling pretty annoyed.	That's nuts! Did they get charged?
My sister is a journalist and she got her first big story published in the paper today!	That's awesome, what was it on.
It is! It's a really big deal and I couldn't be happier for her.	That's great she gets to do that! I bet she's full of joy right now!
So my partner gave me the biggest surprise this week.	Oh nice! How did it come out?
He got us a trip to Hawaii! I couldn't believe it, I am so elated!	Wow that's awesome! Hawaii sounds amazing!
I finally went and adopted a cat last month and go way more than I expected!	that is awesome what kind of cat is it?
Well it was only supposed to be her, but we found out she was pregnant! She popped out a whole litter of adorable.	That sounds adorable! Congratulations on your adoption :) What kind of cat is she?

I had to leave town last week and that meant leaving my pets who are my babies. I needed someone who could take care of them properly.	That's really sweet, I hope you guys had fun and are doing good things again soon!
It is very hard! The only one who I'd let do it was my sister and she did an amazing job.	That's sad to hear about. I hope things work out for you in the end.

It's hard to tell! He refused to leave my side the entire time and just watched the other dogs play.	Oh no! Did you scare the little feller?
Im embarrassed to admit I forgot to pick up my brother from worth the other day after agreeing to	What happened?
Ha ha, he was a little miffed. He got over it though when I stopped and got him ice cream on the way back though! I felt like such a jerk.	Haha well thats just classic brother thing to do
I finally took the plunge and decided to go back to school this year.	Good for you! It's such an exciting time!
I start next week! I was super hesitant at first, but I'm so glad I'm making myself do it.	Going back can be a bit scary. But it can be a lot of work (and money, I suppose).
I was going through some stuff and found a box of jewelry my grandparents had gifted me through the years.	What kind?
Yeah, it really made me think of them and old times.	That is nice. I bet thats brought back a lot of memories too

I was able to go home, but I realize now that I didn't even have to	That's great! I had to have shop do a bunch of things when i was younger. You're lucky to have that saved up!

My husband is going through the process of quitting smoking on top of dealing with drama from his parents. He is having a hard time.	Oh that's a tough situation! I'm sorry. But he should be strong for you all, quitting definitely won't help him in the long run.

They aren't being supportive at all, but that's not surprising, that don't support him very well in anything. I just wish I could make it better for him, but I can't	That's really rough. He sounds really depressed. Maybe you should go and talk to them?
I have some great friends. One of them drove me to the airport tomorrow	Well, great friends really are worth the drive - and are a blessing to have on such a short time!
Yes I am, they are great	I bet you had a ton of fun.

We just found out the person working in our accounting department has been stealing money from our company for years.	That is horrible! Did they do it on an off chance or did they just want to get a dollar?

Yes, it just makes me sick to my stomach. You think you know someone but the whole time they are stealing you blind. I don't get some people	that is horrible i hate when that happens you just got a tip stolen from you blind people are the worst
I miss high school. My girlfriend was the best	I can understand.  Do you have friends now?
That's great. College was also fun	I felt that way as well when I separated from my highschool.  College just wasn't fair.

Thank you, that means a lot. I will see her again	thats great, how long have you been friends with her?
I lost my car keys. I'm such a fool!	Oh man did the police have any leads?
That's pretty funny, and makes me feel better. This is the first time I've lost my keys so I hope to keep it that way!	I hope they didn't steal anything

Yeah I sure was, he seems to like this one much better than the last one he had over. He couldn't wait for that first guy to leave.	That is a strange situation.  Did the friend treat him well or were they not good at all?  I am guessing he was mad that he didnt get to leave sooner.

Man there aren't many people I would give my last couple hundred dollars to, with one notable exception.	What about a bank account?
