I finished first in a race. I feel like gold	Nice, what kind of race was it?
Yes! It was my first victory. All my hard work is paying off	That's great! Was first place a marathon, or a bike race?

Some of my friends told me that they had a big surprise for me. They know I hate surprises, but I complied and let the blindfold me and drive me out to the location.	I like to drive around in my blindfold too. I hope I don't get road rage like you do lol.

They had decided to pool their money together and get me one big present together. It was a flying lesson at the local airport.	wow that is a big surprise, I would feel the same way. Where did they get the gift?
I found an old photo album at my grandma's house that had pictures of me when I was a kid	Do you miss your family and friends?
Yeah, it did. I really miss the 90s. Everything seemed a lot simpler in those days	I agree.  I love looking through my old photos albums

When I was in middle school, I had a friend come over to ride horses with me. After riding my mother pressured me to get on a horse bareback I wasn't comfortable riding. She made such a big scene that I got on to make her stop.	That's so cool. I bet your mom was proud

Yes, the horse took off running and I got thrown into a metal fence. My mother then proceeded to yell and me and make fun of me for trusting her. She told me that I should never trust anyone not even my own parents, it was really embarrassing to get yelled at in from my friend. Afterwards my ribs hurt for 2 months.	I hate bullies, they are so bad!

My friend really wanted me to go rollerblading with him, but I haven't been rollerblading since I was a little kid. I didn't want to roll into a car.	It's definitely safer than most sports! Are you okay?
We went, but it was still pretty terrible because I felt completely uncomfortable and was bent over the whole time ready to catch myself.	Hahaha I can understand that

Yes, its hard but I try to remember he does it for our family! I have been trying to adapt to enjoying alone time.	What type of hobbies do he have?

I will try. I'm a pretty anxious person in general so it's hard	Don't feel anxious!  It's perfectly valid to feel anxious in an interview.  Just be confident that the questions they ask will be helpful to you!

To my husband hometown so it'll be new for me but he is excited to be back near family.	That is exciting! Have you met before?

It was pretty tramatic, I still see the dog getting hit in my head and the sound. No, I was on my way to work, I couldn't stop :(	That's pretty sad. Have you thought about getting the dog yourself?
I can't even begin to tell you how nervous I was about my first tattoo.	How old was it?

Definitely! I get lightheaded when I see my own blood, and my pain threshold was low at the time. It turned out great though, and now I have several!	I'm glad it turned out well. I have no idea what my tattoo looks like, but i'm glad you had a nice time with it
I love my husband! He has been so sweet this week!	That is really good to here! What has he been doing to make you so kind!

He knew I had a rough day today so he brought home my favourite wine and Taco Bell! It's the little things :)	That sounds like a nice husband :)  What kind of wine and what kind of taco Bell?  I'm happy to hear it!
It's been a great week!	Why, whats happening?
I got a promotion at work that I wasn't expecting!	Congratulations! That is awesome!

Music is a powerful thing. Sometimes it feels like it can transport you to another time and place. You know what I mean?	I know exactly what you are talking about! Sometimes I feel likeMusic brings me to a different time period. Sometimes even space!

Who can deny it? My dad passed away 2 years ago. Sometimes I put on his old records and imagine what it would have been like to hang out with him in the 70s.	oh no im so sorry for your loss, i know exactly what you mean

I was feeling kind of down so I ended up snuggling with a stuffed rabbit I have. It brought back a lot of good old memories.	That sounds really comfortable! I love stuffed animals! What's the name of the rabbit?

Awe yeah thanks. He's pretty soft even though he some derpy eye that point in opposite directions. Brings me a lot of comfort and reminds me that someone cares.	That is really cute! I love stuffed animals.
My dog got hit by a car.	Oh no! Is he ok though?
He did not live. I've never felt so sad before.	Oh no. Is he okay now?
Some random guy was in my backyard, I didn't realize before I looked outside that I was missing pants.	Oh wow! Did it look pretty big?
Turns out he was the cable guy fixing a wire. Still mad he didn't ask permisson first.	Hahahah that's so funny, did he do it without permission?
My family is still hasn't recovered from the untimely passing of my father two years ago.	That sucks to hear about. I hope they are doing okay
My siblings and I are managing, and have found some peace. My mother is a different story. It was just so sudden and unexpected.	What happened to him? I'm sorry!

I've got a week off from work. Time to sleep in and binge watch my favorite shows.	That sounds like a great relaxing time! I'm jealous! You should go out and enjoy the weekend and get a nice comfy blanket!
I like It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia. I'm rewatching it for the third time	I watch that show too! It is so funny. It feels like I'm in high school again
I was really stressed out and grad school and had no choice but to drop out to keep my sanity.	That's unfortunate. What are you getting your degree in?

That is what I was thinking at the time, but I've been having a really tough time finding a job where I can advance into a higher position. I always seem to get positions with no mobility.	Do you think you have a realistic shot at getting into a higher position at your next job?
I tripped on some steps in front of a whole bunch of people on my way to class.	Are you hurt?
It was pretty humiliating. I fell flat on my face.	Did you cry?

I made chicken noodle soup.	soup is a good soup

I had a meeting last week where I gave a presentation over the wrong documentation and no one said anything until after the meeting.	Oh no.  That's not cool at all!  What did you do after they said they noticed?
After I figured out what I did, I sure was. Ate at my cube ever since I don't even want to make eye contact with anyone.	That's really cool of you! Did it take a lot of time?
I have a really big meeting next week. I have rehearsed what I am to go over all this past week and plan to practice a little more this weekend.	That's really exciting! Good luck to you!
It's a meeting presenting a new product to the board. Big stuff and big money for the company.	Wow! Good luck! I hope all goes well!
I caught my boyfriend texting his ex	That's terrible! How are you feeling about it?
It was definitely a bit flirty. I think he misses being with her	Oh no. Does he think she is cheating?
I know I broke up with my ex, but I can't help but feel irritated when he talks about going on dates.	Those are bad dates too
We actually get along really well and are much better friends than a couple. I guess I still just get a littler territorial, i think he does too.	That is probably true and you still miss him a lot.
I can't wait to see my final grades. I think I got all A's this semester.	Woo hoo! That's awesome!!!  You must be so excited!  Where are you getting your grades?
On Monday. I'm going to treat myself if I did well	That's awesome! I hope you did great and crush the last few nights of studying!
I was very upset when I found my kitten today.	A kitten found its way back through the dog door and probably hit a person or something? How old is your cat?
No, I had to put it down. It ate a poisonous plant. He should not have been outside.	Oh no, that is heartbreaking.

I cried a bit, but kept it together for my little girl because she had let him out.	I enjoy visiting the nursing home on occasion.	That's really neat! I love it when you can spend some time out there with family and have an awesome experience.
Not really, I take my daughter to see them, so many of them have no visitors at all.	Visiting nursing homes is very special. It's an incredibly beautiful place to visit.
She likes to bake, so we take them what she makes :)	That's fair, it can be nice to see your daughter happy!
She is pretty good for an eleven year old, better than I was.	Wow. You are pretty lucky. I am sure you are great parent!

I had a secret and went to my mother to confide in her, as well as get off my chest. I know she would never betray my secret and can always count on her.	That's so sweet of her!  You're a lucky person.
Yes, I sure do! There aren't many people you can feel that way with and I am so grateful!	Sounds like a great secret to keep.  How did you discover the full extent of her love.
My son applied to a prestigious college and the wait killed us. I was anxious and nervous waiting to see if he was accepted!	Oh that must have taken forever!  Did you get the acceptance?
He did! He's in his 3rd year, going to be an Aerospace Engineer, so we are very proud of him.	That's amazing!  I'm so proud of him!  3rd years is a very hard goal to set for anyone!

My sister passed away several years ago. She took her life, and my mother and I found her right after she did it. This was very painful, traumatic and hard for us all.	oh my god i'm so sorry to hear this! My grandmother passed away 3 month after he was diagnosed with athereatics

It didn't really seem to sink in for my mother for awhile, she was in denial. But, it was so hard when it did. I went into a depression for awhile, as she was my only sibling and we were very close.	That sucks, my sister is getting older. She is 50 now. I'm sorry for the loss.
When my son first started college, I felt so much love and affection, but it was definitely hard to see him go! I was very proud though.	You must felt so much happiness with his college career.

He went to the University of Alabama in Huntsville. It's focused on science, engineering, etc. He's going to be an Aerospace Engineer. It's great to see him go for his dreams!	Amazing!  I am proud of your son also!  Does he have a major in science?
We went on vacation a few weeks ago and went to the beach, It was so relaxing and great. I really enjoyed the time with my family.	I love the beach! I'm glad you got to enjoy it.
That's great! I'm sure you earned it, just like we do. It's so good to get some time away from the hustle and bustle of life!	I agree, I get so relaxed and free with life sometimes.
I am looking forward to next week! My husband has been out of town on business for several weeks and comes home next weekend!	What do you guys plan to do?
I am going to cook a special meal and see if he wants to go out, just us two. I know he will like that.	That sounds wonderful. I hope he comes home with a new girlfriend!

My husband has been out of town a few weeks for work but is coming back next weekend. I have a surprise night planned for just us. I am optimistic and sure he will really enjoy it.	That's good! How long will he be gone?
Thanks! We've been married almost 23 years but I try to keep things fun and spend time together.	What do you have planned for this night?

My son went back to college recently and it had me feeling a bit nostalgic. I could just picture him starting Kindergarten and it seemed not so long ago!	I remember when my son went to college. They grow so quickly!

Yes, very. But, time sure has flown by with him growing up. I can just see his little blonde head when he was 5 and just starting school!	True. They grow up so fast! I have a granddaughter that's almost 5. It goes by in a blink of an eye. So many changes and adventures.
I was promoted to a Team Leader and I felt very secure I could do well at the job. I had years of experience and was ready for a leadership role.	That is great, I am happy to hear that!
Yes, thank you! I had worked very hard through the years, and I felt that I earned it, and would do well at it.	that is good, it is always a goal of mine, and theres nothing like family!

There was an incident where one of my back neighbors called my young son a name and made fun of him. I was so mad, beyond angry!	Oh my, please don't let them upset you! If they continue to do it call the police, because that's hate crime!

Yes, and she had two children of her own, similar in age. Her son also weighed more than mine! She did it because my son rode his bike through the corner of her yard as rode around the circle, that made her mad! Can you believe that??	I can believe that!
Last week my granddaughter started school for the first time. I worried about her the entire day.	Oh that's exciting! Is she excited?
It turns out she loves and and I was a mess for 8 hours for nothing.	What a precious moment! How did she grow so much in such a short amount of time?

I always try and plan everything in advance to bring everything we need when we go on vacation. We recently went on our honeymoon and I didn't do very well this time. Ugh!	Did everything turn out OK on your trip?
I forgot everything. I guess I was so excited about the wedding, I totally failed at packing this time. Oh well, it was still fun.	It happens to everyone, dont feel bad!

One day I was visiting a friend and her boyfriend came up and kissed me, while I was waiting for my friend to return from another room! It was sneaky and repulsed me!	That sounds so disgusting! How long ago was this?

I didn't....only because of her situation. She had custody of her very ill and handicapped infant grandson, she wasn't working so depended on him financially and she was very much in love with him. She already suspected he was with other women, and stayed.....	That's really disgusting!  I don't know why some people are willing to do that.  It isn't right.
The other night I was home alone and all of a sudden I heard someone knocking at the door really loud and they wouldn't stop. I was so scared.	What happened?
No, I ignored them and they finally went away. I was just about to call the police before they left though. I hope that doesn't happen again.	Who are they?
I was trying to ignore the fact that my 50th birthday was coming up but my family decided to throw me a surprise party.	Wow. You must be so surprised. What did they buy ya?
It was so much fun and such a happy night. I'm trying to embrace my age now and not ignore it any more	That sounds like so much fun! I wish I had a surprise party!

A few weeks ago, my husband and I had a big argument. I said some pretty hurtful things, and wished I hadn't. I felt very bad and disappointed in myself afterwards.	I am so sorry you went through that! Are things better now between the two of you?
Yes, that's true. I tend to be a bit more verbal on my end and say things I regret later.	Its okay. We all have our bad moments. It's good to realize everyone has their bad moments.

One night when my kids and I came home, I saw a shadow in my hallway as I came in the back door. I was so scared and was afraid someone had broken in my home.	I would be scared too!!  What did you do?  Did you see it?

Yes, and I live out in the country so I wouldn't get a quick response time from emergency vehicles. But, luckily, it turned out to be my shadow!	That's awesome that it turned out to be your shadow!  Did it freak you out?

There was a day that I was a bit short on cash on hand and I didn't give money to a homeless man. I usually always do, as I feel it's my part to help those in need, as I am blessed. I felt very bad that I didn't that day.	I'm really happy for you.  Sometimes hard-working people are overlooked and it can make you feel less important.
Well, homeless people aren't common in my area, so that's why I felt a bit bad about it.	It's ok to give Sometimes you have to live without it
When my children were born, it was a rejoicing time for me. I can't think of a time I felt more happiness.	Congratulations. You must have a very happy and joyful time now.

Yes, I have two children and I feel so blessed to have them. I lucked out and got a boy and girl, both healthy, smart and wonderful.	That's amazing! You're speaking my language right now! I'm so happy to hear you had such an amazing experience and your kids became great adults!

I used to work in a place where all my colleagues had different believes to myself. I wanted to stay true to what I believed in, so had to walk away from conversations on many occasions.	Why did you feel like you had to walk away from certain occasions?

Just that all people should be given an equal chance in life and that no one type of person is better than another, just because of their religion or skin color, or where they come from.	I understand that. It can be a little annoying at times, but it's better than being miserable all the time.

They believed that people of their religion where better than everyone else and were going to heaven, while the rest of us are left at the gate! That's one of their beliefs anyway. I don't agree with that, but chose to keep my mouth shut!	I recently bought a new car after not driving for several years and I was really scared to drive it, especially on the highway.	That's exciting!  Are you excited about driving it?
Just a Honda Civic. People drive crazy around here. I don't want to have another car accident like the last one.	Those hondos are like cars from the 50s!  Did you find it difficult to drive?
I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.	That's great! It's always nice to be able to have supportive friends!  Keep it up!
It has really helped to have their support. I am so grateful for them	That's great to have a group like that. Keep it up and you'll be on the right path soon!

A few years ago I applied for US citizenship. To succeed you have to pass a Civics test. I was so terribly nervous!	Did they give you a chance?  I've always wanted to go into politics, and have a shot at it :)

I passed! Turns out you only had to answer three questions correctly. But they have 50 to choose from so you have to study the lot!	Congratulations!  What was the test about?  How do you think the test determined your national eligibility?

Thank you. My poor husband had to sit every single night and test me. He's American and he didn't think he could pass!	I found some old Christmas cards the other day and had a lovely time reading them and reminiscing about the people who sent them.	Oh, what wonderful times we live with.

It was so nice. I'm terrible about throwing cards out. I feel, if someone's taken the time to write, I should preserve it. Does that sound silly?	Naw! You're right, because if they were thoughtful and wrote properly, it doesn't matter what the writer had to say.
That's very true. My Dad kept everything too. When he passed we had quite a task sorting through things. I think my brother's still at it!	That is a great way to look at it

I believe you are right! My family are going to go nuts when they see what they've got to deal with, lol.	It's always a bit of fun to think about the things that you didn't have before you become a parent!
When I was entering the store it was really slippery.	Slipped on ice cream?
It had been raining , so I ran across the parking lot in to the store. I slid about 3 feet.	That is so scary! Are you ok?
I was fine, just felt like every one was looking at me.	I am feeling a bit guilty about keeping a secret for my friend.	Why, what was the secret?  Do you want to talk about it>

I don't want to out her to her husband, usually the only thing that happens is they drop the friend.	I'm sorry, secrets are always hard! Have you talked to your husband about this? Maybe he can comfort you.
Thanks, I am just going to avoid them until it plays iteself out.	I feel kind of blue today, they announced the parts for the annual play.	A part of what play?

I did, and it is a good one, just not the one that I wanted. I didn't want the lead or anything.	Oh, no! That's never fun when something good like that happens, especially if you're trying to build suspense! What was your favorite part of the play?
It is, my friend got it, or I wouldn't think about it so much. Thanks for the kind words though.	I'm teaching my daughter how to drive, and so far, so good!	Wow, you must be so proud of her!

She is!  At first, though, she was very nervous.  I told her we could start off slow - her dad lives 1 mile from me down a quiet road, so we started driving back and forth between the two houses.	Slow is not bad. Has she started drivingpool?

Hopefully by the first of the year.  We've worked up to driving to the dollar store 5 miles away.  She's still a little nervous but she's getting better and more confident the more we practice.	Wow, that's impressive. She sound like a very determined person.
I do what I can where I can.  Can't wait for our hard work to pay off and she gets her license!	That is awesome! I am happy for you guys!
My house is a mess and I've got people coming over later on this evening.	Don't worry, you will look fabulous and save a ton of time!

I'm going to try to.  If worst comes to worse, I'll just toss everything in my back bedroom, shiny up the floors and hope for the best!  *chuckle*	That's funny, you almost sound like me last month.  It's hard to clean up after everyone when they make a habit of doing it when I'm not home.

My brother and I recently had to sell a house and he dealt with everything. I'm so lucky to have a brother I can rely on and who I know won't try and con me.	That's unfortunate, but lucky to have a brother you can count! What was wrong with his house?

We did and he was so precise with who got what and made sure he sent me my share quickly. He's such a neat brother in so many regards. I always know he'll be there for anyone who needs help.	That's so great! I'm so happy for you! I'm going through something right now myself, and I'm so close to having to sell a house too! I can see it happening!

We weren't always close. When we were kids we were always fighting. It wasn't until we got older that we got closer. We're best of friends now.	Aw, that's great! Sounds like you have a great family. Sounds like you have a great friend too!

Don't be! There are many, many types of relationships and I don't think ours is necessarily typical. It's just the way it is :)	I understand. Are there things that you are both are not as close as you thought?

My son was in advance placement and honors during high school. He went to a prestigious college after, going for as an Aerospace Engineer. He never ceases to astonish me with his intelligence and admire me with how hard he works to pursue his dreams.	You must be very proud of him!

I am quite proud, thank you! I also have a teenage daughter that is very smart and an amazing artist, (which I don't know where she gets that talent). They really impress me with amazing they are!	My son was also placed ahead in certain activities at his school. He is very good at math. He really blew me away with his math and understanding of the material. He is very forthright and listens to what he says. He can also use the internet to help him along!
Going out today to learn a new route for my job and I'm hoping that I don't get lost.	You must be excited! Where will you be doing this?

I got the assignment yesterday, and I told myself that I'd go drive around it today and tomorrow.  My boss is supposed to ride along with me the first week, and then after that I'll be on my own.	Sounds good. Where are you going?

I was over here in the US when my Grandma passed in Scotland. I was so upset - nobody could get hold of me to tell me and her funeral was over before I knew about it.	Oh I'm so sorry. I've lost both of mine. It's hard when you don't really have anyone to talk to.

Only for funerals, unfortunately. Both my parents have since died. Unpleasant fact of life, I'm afraid.	I'm sorry to hear that.  I'm in the UK - my grandmother died in Hawaii not long after she lived here.  How old were you at the time?

Yes I was. I didn't come to the US until I was in my 30s. Didn't expect my Grandma to pass the minute I got here, but she was 96, so it shouldn't have been such a surprise!	Oh no! I'm sorry for your loss!  I can only imagine how hard that must have been.

She was as fit as a flea too. She tripped and broke her hip and got a bad infection in the hospital. That's what she died of!	That is so sad to hear about.  I hope it wasn't too serious of an infection.  Is it still treatable?
I just bought an Xbox! I've never owned a gaming console before	I am sure you are excited, but you are in for a world of pain and frustration. I would just wait until you get it and try it out!
I am! I bought Halo and am ready to ride.	Sweet. I just got the one too. I love it. Halo is my favorite video game of all time

My father passed away 2 years ago, but my mother lives in my neighborhood now. I'm so thankful she lives close by and still here with us. She's such a wonderful mother.	Thats so wonderful! i'm so sorry for your loss! :( I recently lost both my parents in a car wreck. I know how hard that is. :(

I'm sorry to hear that, I know it's so hard to lose a parent. I think we take them for granted when we are younger, but I am blessed she's still here.	I'm sorry to hear about your loss as well. At some point you have to recognize their greatness.
I am as happy as a clam right now. My neighbors are away for the weekend!	That is awesome. I love being able to have a little space while they are away
The live upstairs and constantly thump around, screeching into their cellphones. And then there's the video games...	That is so awesome! I bet you will enjoy it!

Oh I am, believe me I am. The world seems like a calm, serene place where everything is just right!	My friend from across the continent came over yesterday! I was so happy about it	Oh awesome. Was there a special occasion?
We ended up hanging out and recording some audio. He is a voice actor	That's cool! How long has it been since you seen him?

I was out for a walk one night in a suburb of Boston when we heard the cries of a young animal. It was a baby kitten, with no collar, in a window well.	That's so heartbreaking!  I hope the kitten was fine, did you take it home to feed it?

We actually did, and ended up adopting him. He was still so young he needed formula, but now he is thriving!	That's awesome!  I love babies, and babies don't have to be scared of other people!  What kind of cat do you have?
I felt a need to help when the baby bird was by itself	aww that was really nice of you, baby birds are the best
I did not, I was little but I think I put it back into a tree	awww. that was sweet of you.
Waiting to see if I would graduate was pretty unnerving	Was it a difficult class?
Yep, had to take a class online over the summer but it worked out	What class was it on?
I forgot my mother-in-law's birthday this year and can't look her in the eye!	Oh my goodness! I'm so sorry! Did you ask around and see if she's calendar able?
I just feel so embarrassed - she never forgets my birthday. And my husband was away and didn't remind me :(	Oh wow! I can't imagine what that is like.

You're right. She's a very forgiving person and I've never forgotten before. It's on St. Paddy's day for heavens sake - how could I forget???	I was the only one wearing pajamas at this party, not my greatest moment	I'm sure nobody noticed
I thought that it was a pajama party haha, never worn a dress before, maybe that's the secret	How long were you out of the party?
I had some trippy nightmares as a kid, now I don't really have dreams	Yeah, I've been there. It's not a good thing

Yeah, it was like I was tied to a chair and a huge thing was staring at me, pretty weird	That would be really terrifying.  I can relate.  I'm terrified to have dreams that are too realistic.  It gives me so many nightmares!  What techniques can you suggest to deal with them?
I didn't realize that stealing was bad until I realized how it made me feel afterwards	I could see how it might make you feel bad.  What happened that made you feel that way?
No, I was scared to get charged, but I stopped after that	It's not that bad in the grand scheme of the world, it's stealing that's worse.
I was at a meditation retreat last year for 10 days and I can say that I experienced a better feeling there than I could ever remembe	That's really good to hear! How did you do?
Yeah, thankfully there's an app for that - Headspace (no I am not sponsored)	I'm not familiar with Headspace, but if it helps you focus, then it would work out pretty good for you!
I am really looking forward to going away for the holidays.	Me too! where are you goiing?
I want to go see the Harry Potter land at Universal, the kids will love it.	That sounds like a lot of fun!  Are you going alone or with kids?
They love the films, plus getting to ride Hogwarts Express, score!	I'm really hoping my acceptance letter shows up in the mail soon.	When will you hear back?

Law School, I'm pretty sure I got in to my first choice, but you never know.	That's amazing! I hope your acceptance letter comes in soon! I had two acceptance letters and three acceptance letters in the last four years... neither worked so I'm hoping mine comes soon too!
Thank you, fingers are crossed.	I just ordered a new cookery book and am eagerly awaiting its arrival. I want to delve in and try lots of new recipes!	What kind of cookery do you do

I'm vegetarian and cook all sorts of different cuisines - Indian, Italian, American. The only cuisine I'm not good at is Chinese. How about you?	I'm not vegetarian either but I've always loved trying new things. I like Mexican especially. You should totally try it out and let me know if you like it. I bet you will love it. vegetarian btw.

Have you heard of Mark Bittman's book How to Cook Everything Vegetarian? That's the book I'm waiting impatiently for!	I witnessed the most epic bottle flip in the history of bottle flips at my school	Oh yeah? How old were you at the time?
Yee yee, it landed on this little ledge that was super high up.	Did you cry when you saw it happen?
My little grandson just came home from the hospital. He was born premature and weighted under 2 pounds.	Oh my goodness! How old is he?!
He is doing well, thank you. And we are so thankful everything is ok. It was touch and go for awhile	That is great.  Being ill and pregnant is tough
I love my girlfriend. She would never cheat on me	Thats great. How often do you see her
I hope to make her my wife some day!	That's great! It's amazing how many people don't view other people as a partner. How does that make you feel when it happens to you?
My sister spilled some milk on me. It set me off!	Oh no! That's horrible!
It was indeed a mistake. My clothes are fine now.	Uh oh!  Is she going to be upset if you admit to the mistake?

I recently did not pay my rent. My land lord has been terrible at providing services	That really sucks.. landlord aren't supposed to provide help for things like that! Landlords should really train their own employees better.
He decided to start caring and doing his part.	I'm so proud of you!  Not everyone gets lucky like that.
I'm thankful that I was able to repair my tire before it went flat on my car	That's great! How did it happen?

I love my friend. She just drove me to class	that was nice of her.. anything special you got in return?
I think I am getting her a gift soon!	Well that's nice! What was the class?

I do, but maybe not with he same flare as before	yea i know what you mean i was like that too

5	I have no idea what 5 is. Can someone enlighten me please?

Yeah that's what my dentist says, I'll try	I am glad that you get carette.

I think it's from dreams that I'm not able to recall	That's terrible. Have dreams often?
